name.str: AMG UH-1 Gen II Holo Sight

description: The AMG UH-1 Gen II holographic sight is a high-tech optic designed for rapid target acquisition and precision shooting. It features a large viewing window that provides an expansive field of view, making it ideal for fast-paced shooting situations. The Gen II version incorporates improvements over its predecessor, such as enhanced durability, clearer reticle optics, and improved battery life. Its holographic reticle offers a bright and crisp aiming point, allowing shooters to quickly acquire and engage targets with accuracy. The sight is also designed to withstand harsh environments and recoil, making it suitable for various firearms and shooting conditions.

name.str: Truglo Prism PR1 Red Dot Sight

description: The Truglo Prism PR1 1x25mm red-dot sight is a rugged and versatile optic designed for hunting and tactical applications. It features a 1x magnification for quick target acquisition and a 25mm objective lens for a clear and wide field of view. The sight is durable and adjustable, allowing for precise customization to suit individual shooting preferences.

name.str: RD U2 3 MOA Red Dot Sight

description: The RD U2 3 MOA red dot sight is a compact and lightweight optic designed for quick target acquisition in various shooting scenarios. It features a 3 MOA (Minute of Angle) red dot reticle, providing a precise aiming point for accurate shots at short to medium ranges. The sight is easy to mount and adjust, making it suitable for rifles, shotguns, and handguns.

The UTG 3X Magnifier is an optical accessory designed to enhance the magnification of red dot sights, providing shooters with a clearer and closer view of their target. It features a 3X magnification capability, which effectively triples the size of the reticle in the red dot sight.

The Feyachi RS-30 Reflex Sight is a compact and versatile optic designed for rapid target acquisition in close to mid-range shooting scenarios. It features a wide field of view and a 4 MOA red dot reticle, providing a clear and precise aiming point for quick and accurate shots.

name.str: Apex Predator V1 Red Dot Sight

description: The Apex Predator V1 Red Dot Sight is an advanced optic designed for precision shooting and rapid target acquisition. It features a crisp 2 MOA red dot reticle that provides a clear and precise aiming point for quick and accurate shots. The sight offers unlimited eye relief and a wide field of view, allowing shooters to maintain situational awareness while aiming.
The Falcon V2 1-4x24mm LPVO (Low Power Variable Optic) SFP (Second Focal Plane) Scope is a versatile and high-performance optic designed for a wide range of shooting applications.

The SIG Sauer BRAVO4 4x30 scope is a rugged and high-performance optic featuring a fixed 4x magnification and a 30mm objective lens. It is equipped with the ACSS reticle for quick and accurate target acquisition, and its durable construction makes it suitable for tactical and hunting use in various conditions.

R3 Fiber Optic Iron Sights are a type of firearm sights that use fiber optic technology to enhance visibility and aiming accuracy. They typically feature a front sight with a fiber optic rod that gathers ambient light to create a bright aiming point. The rear sight often complements the front sight with a contrasting color or a similar fiber optic element for quick and intuitive alignment. R3 Fiber Optic Iron Sights are popular among shooters for their brightness, durability, and effectiveness in low-light conditions.

The Magpul MBUS 3 Flip-Up Iron Sights are a set of rugged and reliable backup sights designed for use on rifles and carbines equipped with Picatinny rails. They feature a low-profile design when folded down, minimizing interference with other optics or accessories on the firearm. When needed, they can be quickly flipped up into position for use.
